trans-unit.source: This exception is thrown whenever there is a problem with the user's custom toolset definition file.
trans-unit.target: 只要用户的自定义工具集定义文件存在问题，就会引发此异常。

trans-unit.source: The problem might be semantic or syntactical.
trans-unit.target: 该问题可能是语义问题也可能是语法问题。

trans-unit.source: If the problem is in the syntax, it can typically be caught by XSD validation.
trans-unit.target: 如果该问题是语法问题，则通常是由 XSD 验证导致的。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.InvalidToolsetDefinitionException" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.InvalidToolsetDefinitionException" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.InvalidToolsetDefinitionException" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.InvalidToolsetDefinitionException" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: This constructor initializes the <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> property of the new instance to a system-supplied message that describes the error, such as "DefaultMessageDisplayedByParameterlessCtorWriterMustSupply" This message takes into account the current system culture.
trans-unit.target: 此构造函数初始化<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>会考虑当前系统的系统提供描述诸如"DefaultMessageDisplayedByParameterlessCtorWriterMustSupply"此消息的错误消息的新实例的属性区域性。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.InsufficientMemoryException>.
trans-unit.target: 下表显示 <xref:System.InsufficientMemoryException> 的实例的初始属性值。

trans-unit.source: Property
trans-unit.target: Property

trans-unit.source: Value
`null`.
trans-unit.target: `null`。

trans-unit.source: The localized error message string.
trans-unit.target: 本地化的错误消息字符串。

trans-unit.source: The error message that explains the reason for the exception.
trans-unit.target: 解释异常原因的错误消息。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.InvalidToolsetDefinitionException" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.InvalidToolsetDefinitionException" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.InvalidToolsetDefinitionException>.
trans-unit.target: 下表显示 <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.InvalidToolsetDefinitionException> 的实例的初始属性值。

trans-unit.source: Property
trans-unit.target: Property

trans-unit.source: Value
`null`.
trans-unit.target: `null`。

trans-unit.source: The error message string specified in `message`.
trans-unit.target: `message` 中指定的错误消息字符串。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" /> that holds the serialized object data about the exception being thrown.
trans-unit.target: 包含有关所引发异常的序列化对象数据的 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext" /> that contains contextual information about the source or destination.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext" />，它包含关于源或目标的上下文信息。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.InvalidToolsetDefinitionException" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.InvalidToolsetDefinitionException" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: This constructor is called during deserialization to reconstitute the exception object transmitted over a stream.
trans-unit.target: 此构造函数在反序列化过程中调用，以便重建通过流传输的异常对象。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [XML and SOAP Serialization](~/docs/standard/serialization/xml-and-soap-serialization.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[XML 和 SOAP 序列化](~/docs/standard/serialization/xml-and-soap-serialization.md)。

trans-unit.source: The error message that explains the reason for the exception.
trans-unit.target: 解释异常原因的错误消息。

trans-unit.source: The error code.
trans-unit.target: 错误代码。

trans-unit.source: This parameter can be a null reference (<see langword="Nothing" />).
trans-unit.target: 此参数可以是空引用 (<see langword="Nothing" />)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.InvalidToolsetDefinitionException" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.InvalidToolsetDefinitionException" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: An exception that is thrown as a direct result of a previous exception should include a reference to the previous exception in the <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 因前一个异常而直接引发的异常应在 <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> 属性中包含对前一个异常的引用。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property returns the same value that is passed into the constructor, or `null` if the <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property does not supply the inner exception value to the constructor.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> 属性返回的值与传递到构造函数中的值相同；或者，如果 `null` 属性没有向构造函数提供内部异常值，则为 <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.InvalidToolsetDefinitionException>.
trans-unit.target: 下表显示 <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.InvalidToolsetDefinitionException> 的实例的初始属性值。

trans-unit.source: Property
trans-unit.target: Property

trans-unit.source: Value
`null`.
trans-unit.target: `null`。

trans-unit.source: The error message string specified in `message`.
trans-unit.target: `message` 中指定的错误消息字符串。

trans-unit.source: The error message that explains the reason for the exception.
trans-unit.target: 解释异常原因的错误消息。

trans-unit.source: The error code.
trans-unit.target: 错误代码。

trans-unit.source: This parameter can be a null reference (<see langword="Nothing" />).
trans-unit.target: 此参数可以是空引用 (<see langword="Nothing" />)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.InvalidToolsetDefinitionException" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.InvalidToolsetDefinitionException" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The error message that explains the reason for the exception.
trans-unit.target: 解释异常原因的错误消息。

trans-unit.source: The error code.
trans-unit.target: 错误代码。

trans-unit.source: This parameter can be a null reference (<see langword="Nothing" />).
trans-unit.target: 此参数可以是空引用 (<see langword="Nothing" />)。

trans-unit.source: The exception that is the cause of the current exception.
trans-unit.target: 导致当前异常的异常。

trans-unit.source: If the <c>innerException</c> parameter is not a null reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic), the current exception is raised in a <see langword="catch" /> block that handles the inner exception.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <c>innerException</c> 参数不是空引用（在 Visual Basic 中为 <see langword="Nothing" />），则在处理内部异常的 <see langword="catch" /> 块中引发当前异常。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.InvalidToolsetDefinitionException" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.InvalidToolsetDefinitionException" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Gets the exception error code that was thrown.
trans-unit.target: 获取引发的异常错误代码。

trans-unit.source: A string representing the error code.
trans-unit.target: 一个表示错误代码的字符串。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" /> that holds the serialized object data about the exception being thrown.
trans-unit.target: 包含有关所引发异常的序列化对象数据的 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext" /> that contains contextual information about the source or destination.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext" />，它包含关于源或目标的上下文信息。

trans-unit.source: Sets the <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" /> with information about the exception.
trans-unit.target: 使用关于异常的信息设置 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" />。

trans-unit.source: This constructor is called during deserialization to reconstitute the exception object transmitted over a stream.
trans-unit.target: 此构造函数在反序列化过程中调用，以便重建通过流传输的异常对象。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [XML and SOAP Serialization](~/docs/standard/serialization/xml-and-soap-serialization.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[XML 和 SOAP 序列化](~/docs/standard/serialization/xml-and-soap-serialization.md)。
